expo.name: Jesse Krim - greatPlaces
expo.description: Save your favorite locations! Application to practice native device features!

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow an image to be taken of a user's location.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo access is required in order to save the photos that are taken by the device camera
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the users location to save their current location, no data is tracked or stored.
